title: Hour 1 - Adam Shefter (04-22-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Adam Shefter (04-22-20)
description:
Adam Shefter talks about how at least 20 teams should have shown an interest in Tom Brady. Adam breaks down how the Gronkowski trade to Tampa was done.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
